privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Strategos Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Strategos is a portfolio intelligence platform that allows users to track and analyze digital assets and investments.

sections.title: Information We Collect
body: We may collect:
• Email address if authentication is used
• Public blockchain wallet addresses voluntarily connected
• Usage data such as browser type and interaction events
• Analytics data for performance improvements
Strategos does not custody funds.
Strategos does not access private keys.
Strategos does not execute transactions on behalf of users.

sections.title: How We Use Information
body: We use collected information to:
• Provide portfolio visualization features
• Improve reliability and performance
• Enhance security
• Respond to user inquiries
We do not sell personal data.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
body: We may use:
• Authentication providers
• Hosting providers (Vercel)
• Analytics services
Each provider operates under its own privacy policy.

sections.title: Data Security
body: We implement reasonable technical safeguards.

sections.title: Data Retention
body: We retain data only as long as necessary to provide the service.

sections.title: User Rights
body: Users may have rights to access, correct, or delete their data depending on jurisdiction.

{email}

sections.title: Acceptance
body: By using Strategos, you agree to these Terms.

sections.title: No Financial Advice
body: Strategos provides analytics tools.
Nothing constitutes financial, legal, or tax advice.
Users are solely responsible for their decisions.

sections.title: No Custody
body: Strategos does not hold assets, private keys, or execute transactions.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
body: Users agree to use the service lawfully and not attempt to disrupt it.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
body: Strategos is provided “as is” without warranties.
We are not responsible for investment losses.

body: We may update these terms periodically.
